question: Icyapa cyerekana ahantu amategeko y' Umuhanda urombeje w'ibice byinshi atangirira  gukurikizwa, kirangwa n'ibirango (ibimenyetso) by'amabara akurikira:
Nta tara na rimwe cyangwa akagarurarumuri bishobora kuba bifunze ku buryo igice  cyabyo cyo hasi cyane kimurika kitaba kiri hasi y'ibipimo bikurikira kuva ku butaka  igihe ikinyabiziga kidapakiye :

options: Aho utagomba kurenza ibirometero 30 mu isaha
Nyuma y'ikona ugategereza kubona uburyo bwo kunyuranaho
question: Niki muri ibi wakwirinda mugihe ushaka kunyuranaho?

options: igihe gusa ari ngombwa amenyesha ibindi binyabiziga bimukurikiye
igihe gusa aringombwa kuburira abandi bayobozi bava mukindi cyerekezo
mugihe gikwiye ushaka kumenyesha abandi bakoresha umuhanda icyo ugiye gukora
keretse ahari ibimenyetso byo mu muhanda byerekana icyerekezo cyawe
question: Niryari amatara ndanga cyerekezo agomba kugaragazwa kubandi bakoresha umuhanda  ?

options: Igabanurwa ry'umubare w'ibisate by'umuhanda mu cyerekezo bajyamo
question: Umurongo uciyemo uduce umenyesha ahegereye umurongo ushobora kuzuzwa  n'uturanga gukata tw'ibara ryera utwo turanga cyerekezo tumenyesha :

options: Umuyobozi abujijwe kurenga umurongo wera ucagaguye cyeretse mugihe bitateza  icyago
Biremewe kunyuranaho ariko nturenge umurongo wera ucagaguye
question: Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
Amatara ndangacyerekezo agomba kugaragara nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye mu ntera  nibura ya:
Mu migi no ku yindi mihanda y'igihugu igenwa na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu  n'ibintu uburebure ntarengwa kuri buri mitambiko 3 ifungwaho ibiziga bine ni:

options: kutarenza umuvuduko wa km20 mu isaha
uburebure bwabyo habariwemo ibyo bitwaye bukaba butarengeje m6
A na B nibyo bisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ibinyabiziga bihinga n'ibindi bikoresho byihariye bikoreshwa n'ibigo bipatana imirimo,  iyo bigenda mu nzira nyabagendwa igihe cya nijoro cyangwa bitewe n'uko ibihe  bimeze bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200 bishobora kugaragazwa inyuma  n'amatara 2 atukura, bipfa kuba bitarenza ibipimo bikurikira:

options: N'inyamaswa zitarenze 20 kandi zitandukanijwe n'intera ya metero 10
N'inyamaswa zitarenze 10 kandi zitandukanijwe n'intera ya metero 20
N'inyamaswa zitarenze 8 zitandukanyijwe n'intera ya metero 10
question: Iyo igenda mu nzira nyabagendwa imikumbi, igomba kugabanywamo udutsiko  tugizwe

options: mu kaboko k'iburyo hakurikijwe aho yaganaga uretse igihe ari mu muhanda  w'icyerekezo kimwe
ahegereye bishobotse akayira k'abanyamaguru iyo umuhanda ugafite ariko  umwanya w'ibiziga n'akayira ntube urenga santimetero 50
Ibisubizo byo haruguru byose ni byo by'ukuri
question: Uretse igihe hari amategeko yihariye akurikizwa muri ako karere cyangwa  imitunganyirize bwite y'aho, ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa inyamaswa ihagaze umwanya  muto cyangwa munini igomba kuba iri aha hakurikira:

options: a na b byose ni ukuri
question: Igice cy'inzira nyabagendwa kigarukira kumirongo ibiri yera icagaguye ibangikanye  kandi gifite ubugari budahagije kugirango imodoka zitambuke neza kiba ari:

options: Hanyurwa na bose uretse abahaturiye n'abahagenda
question: Iki cyapa gisobanuye iki?
Ni ikihe icyapa gisobanura umuhanda w'icyerekezo kimwe:
Ubugari bw'imizigo yikorewe n'amagare na velomoteri kimwe na romoroki zikuruwe  n'ibyo binyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza
Iki cyapa gisobanuye iki?

options: b na c ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Za otobisi zagenewe gutwara abanyeshuri zishobora gushyirwaho amatara abiri asa  n'icunga rihishije amyasa kugirango yerekane ko zihagaze no kwerekana ko  bagomba kwitonda, ayo matara ashyirwaho ku buryo bukurikira :
Ku binyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntigishobora  kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:

options: Iyo umuhanda umurikiye umuyobozi abasha kureba muri metero 20
question: Amatara maremare y'ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:

options: Metero 3 byibura hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi
Metero 1 byibura hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi
Metero 1 na cm 55 hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi
question: Iyo banyuze iruhande rw'inkomyi abanyamaguru bangomba gukikira banyuze mu  muhanda, abayobozi b'ibinyabiziga bagomba gusiga umwanya ufite ubugari bwa
